name: BRAZILIAN STRAIGHT
description:
This hair is in its pure and natural state, no chemical processing or coloring. This hair is very durable, minimal to no shedding, and tangle-free. With proper maintenance it will be reusable. Hair can be curled, flat ironed, colored and permed just like your own .

· Texture -- BONE STRAIGHT 
· Color - Natural brown or black
· Weight - 3.2-3.5 oz/bundle

How much hair will I need for a full head for a full natural look ?

Lengths 10-14|| 2 bundles
Lengths 16-22 || 3 bundles
Lengths 24-30 || 4+ bundles

Please note bundles suggestions above are the usual amount needed. Not everyone will need this amount of hair, some more and some less. But if you are a first time buyer we suggest that you take our suggestions into consideration.


GRADE 5A HAIR
